title: Great product!
content:
I got these a few weeks ago and started using them when needed. The packaging is pretty and these are perfect to throw in your purse or your gym bag for on the go. They are easy to use and provide the right amount of protection. These come in different sizes for different stages of your cycle. Definitely getting these again!
multi sizes
I am so glad they make these because my flow is so irregular, I never know what size I need. Who wants to buy 3 different full boxes of each size. I have used this brand since I was a teen. Great absorption, with a classic design.
